chapter.title: Building
chapter.para: This chapter will show you all needed steps to compile and deploy a MyAdmin based project. If you want to compile MyAdmin itself, please see .

step.title: Run bootstrap script
step.para: Before building a MyAdmin based project some dependencies are needed for the build itself (mainly ant tasks). A project build bootstrap ant script is provided that will set up the environment needed to build. It is located at ${build.project}/ant/myadmin/MyAdminProjectBuildBootstrap.xml executing the default target will load all dependencies.

step.title: Set up Ivy
step.para: Some dependencies are not available in any public repositories and therefore not resolvable by Ivy. A custom ivysettings.xml containing repositories for all needed dependencies is provided. To use it choose Window PreferencesIvySettings from the main menu bar and add the ivysettings.xml by using the workspace button and selecting the file from ${build.project}/ant
